author: ehillenius
msg: StringResourceModel: build in feature that takes the passed in Component of onGetObject in case the component that was passed in in the constructor was null. All tests fail, can't think of any side effects (as Wicket will keep on searching the hierarchy anyway and using null on Localizer is not particularly helpful) and StringResourceModel works more like ResourceModel now.
